item.description:
On Sunday, May 19 there is a Trail Ride to benefit Amazing Grace Horse Rescue. This is a fun event with prizes, camaraderie, and knowing you will be helping a great cause.

Even if you don't have a horse come on in and offer your support. Looking at horses is a good pastime and lots of fun for children. Find Amazing Grace Equine on facebook for more info. The Equestrian Events Lot on Halfway Pond Road, Carver. Look for the signs on Sunday.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Amazing Grace Equine, 3rd Annual Benefit Trail Ride
